thread.title: One killed in southern France supermarket hostage taking - local media

title: One killed in southern France supermarket hostage taking - local media
text:
One killed in southern France supermarket hostage taking - local media Friday, March 23, 2018 - 00:47 
At least one person has been killed in a hostage situation in southern France involving a man claiming allegiance to Islamic State, according to local reports. Rough cut (no reporter narration).   
At least one person has been killed in a hostage situation in southern France involving a man claiming allegiance to Islamic State, according to local reports. Rough cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2Ghb1Kx
